articles.title: DPRK Proposes Inter-Korean Parliamentary Contact
articles.content:
DPRK Proposes Inter-Korean Parliamentary Contact
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Wednesday sent the south Korean parliament a letter proposing parliamentarian contact and negotiations. The proposed contact and negotiations were clarified in the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea's appeal to all Koreans.
					 The letter noted that the DPRK proposed contact and negotiations of lawmakers between the SPA and the south Korean parliament out of the steadfast will to defuse the acute situation of the Korean Peninsula, improve the north-south relations and open up a new phase for peace and reunification. Any member of the Korean nation should never turn aside from the present grave situation, it noted.
					
					 The parliament representing the people's mindset should lend an ear to the voices of all the fellow countrymen desirous of the improved north-south relations and their dialogue, the letter said, adding: It is quite natural for the parliaments of the north and the south to sit face to face to discharge their responsibility and duty now that military talks are to be opened between the two sides.
					
					 The letter expressed hope that the south Korean parliament would positively respond to this sincere proposal and appeal.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Korean Social Democratic Party and the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, the National Reconciliation Council, the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and other public organizations and religious organizations of the DPRK sent letters calling for response to the proposed north-south dialogue to the ruling and opposition parties and organizations of south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Sri Lankan President
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Iranian FM
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Mahinda Rajapaksa, president of Sri Lanka, on the 63rd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Sri Lanka would grow stronger in the common interests of the two peoples.
					
					He heartily wished the president and the government of Srianka greater success in their work for political stability and development of the country and wellbeing of the people.

articles.title: Lunar New Year Greetings to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Lunar New Year Greetings to Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung across the country on the lunar New Year's Day.
					 Soldiers of the Korean People's Army and working people from all walks of life visited the statues with boundless reverence for the President.
					
					 Seen before the statue of the President on Mansu Hill was a floral basket from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Floral baskets and flowers were laid before the statue by officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, and institutions and enterprises at all levels in the city of Pyongyang, soldiers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people from all walks of life, school youth and children and overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland.
					
					 They made deep bows to the statue in humble reverence for the President.
					
					 Meanwhile, floral baskets and flowers were placed before his statues in Pyongyang and local areas.

articles.title: Lunar New Year Celebration of Schoolchildren Held
articles.content:
Lunar New Year Celebration of Schoolchildren Held 
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A lunar New Year celebration of schoolchildren took place at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace here on Thursday.
					 The celebration began with prologue "We Extend Lunar New Year Greetings".
					
					 Amid the display of beautiful songs and dances, schoolchildren and little boys and girls made lunar New Year bows to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has realized the grand plan of prosperity for the bright future for the country, the people and the rising generation.
					
					 The numbers of the celebration performance included "We Are Happy under Care of Marshal Kim Il Sung", "The General Represents the Whole World", "We Are Grateful for the Party's Care", "We Sing with Accordion of Love" and "The Happiest Day".
					
					 The performers vividly depicted the bright appearance of schoolchildren displaying their hope and talents while learning to their heart's content with nothing to envy in the world under the care of the socialist country founded by President Kim Il Sung and glorified by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present on invitation to enjoy the performance were senior officials of party, state and army, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, soldiers, persons of merits, working people in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.

articles.title: Study Tour of Kim Jong Il's Birthplace Launched
articles.content:
Study Tour of Kim Jong Il's Birthplace Launched
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country started their study tour of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp on the occasion of his birthday.
					 A meeting for starting the tour took place in front of the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower in Hyesan on Feb. 2.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the tower and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A reporter and speeches were made there.
					
					 After the meeting, the study tour group started its march for Pochonbo, carrying the flags bearing the portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in its van.

articles.title: Pyongyang on Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Pyongyang on Lunar New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Pyongyangites enjoyed happy lunar New Year's Day.
					 An endless stream of visitors flowed to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill, carrying floral baskets and flowers.
					
					 The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition was crowded with visitors to see the immortal flowers.
					
					 Citizens visited their teachers, elders, relatives and friends to exchange lunar New Year greetings with beautiful flowers and bouquets bought at flower shops and stalls on streets.
					
					 Working people and school youth and children had folk games and sports and amusement games, conspicuously decorating the capital city on the lunar New Year's Day.
					
					 Citizens also enjoyed a pleasant time at the Central Zoo and the Taesongsan Fun Fair while performances were given at theatres before full house.
					
					 The Okryu Restaurant, the Chongryu Restaurant, provincial specialty restaurants and other catering centers served festive food, national and foreign dishes to stir up the festive mood.

articles.title: Custom of New Year's Greetings
articles.content:
Custom of New Year's Greetings
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- New Year's bow is conspicuous in the DPRK on lunar New Year's Day.
					 Making formal bow of respect to their elders in the morning on New Year's Day has been the custom of remote antiquity of the Korean nation.
					
					 People make New Year's visits to the elders of their families and neighborhoods as well as their teachers and friends.
					
					 The old people would prepare simple gifts for children and festive dishes for adults.
					
					 Koreans also used New Year's box through which people made New Year's greetings without personally calling at the elders.
					
					 Those at high posts and the aged put tables inside the gates of their houses so that those who are too busy to call at others would put notes on which New Year's greetings are written even through the third party.
					
					 New Year's box manners turned into New Year's cards along with the development of the postcard system.

articles.title: Naval Military Exercises Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Naval Military Exercises Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A brigade for special warfare of the south Korean puppet navy staged a naval infiltration drill on Tuesday, according to south Korea's Yonhap News. 
					 The puppet warmongers were hell-bent on the exercises of infiltrating into the area of the DPRK through sea to guide bombing or implant explosives for attacking core targets.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Exploits Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Exploits Lauded
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Humberto Vargas Carbonel, general secretary of the People's Vanguard of Costa Rica, issued a statement praising General Secretary Kim Jong Il's feats on January 25 on the occasion of his birthday.
					 What is conspicuous in Kim Jong Il's party leadership feats is that he developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the vanguard guiding the cause of the Songun revolution by carrying forward the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, the statement said.
					
					 His reelection as general secretary of the WPK provided rosier future for the WPK and the Korean revolution and a decisive guarantee for prosperity of the Korean nation, it stressed.
					
					 It expressed belief that under his experienced and tested leadership the WPK the Korean people would glorify the immortal revolutionary exploits of the President forever and bring about a decisive turn in the improvement of the people's standard of living and the building of a great, prosperous and powerful country by accelerating the development of light industry once again this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Mexico
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Mexico issued bulletins on the occasion of February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletins carried photos of the leader.
					
					 The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism said in an article titled "Kim Jong Il Revered by the People" carried in the 51st issue of its bulletin: The Korean people have celebrated February 16 as the greatest holiday of the nation every year. This is a clear proof that Kim Jong Il enjoys deep reverence from the people.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power, the bulletin said, adding that his benevolent politics serves as the basic guarantee whereby the DPRK society has been successfully built into a big family.
					
					 The Korean people deem it their highest honor and greatest happiness to be led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il and His Birthday" carried in the 71st issue of its bulletin, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea dealt with the significant stories about February 16 every year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Nicaragua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Nicaragua
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Nicaraguan Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on January 27.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also refers to the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia concierto por el Ano Nuevo Lunar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia concierto por el Ano Nuevo Lunar
						
 Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio junto con los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito el concierto del Ano Nuevo Lunar de la Orquesta Unhasu. 
					  Cuando el Dirigente aparecio en el palco, los espectadores le acogieron hospitalariamente deseandole feliz ano nuevo y reflejando la ilimitada veneracion de todos los militares y civiles.
					
					  El Dirigente respondio cordialmente a la efusiva aclamacion de ellos y les felicito calidamente por esa fiesta. 
					
					  En el concierto se presentaron diversas piezas como el coro "Es mejor nuestra nacion", el solo femenino "Cancion de amistad", el sexteto de saxofono "Mi esposa", el trio femenino "Quiero el socialismo", etc.
					
					  En la ocasion los ejecutantes demostraron bien el indoblegable espiritu de lucha heroica del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente, avanzan a galopes hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera dando impulso incesante en los ijares de Chollima del Songun y a la ofensiva general llenos de conviccion y optimismo de la victoria. 
					
					  Muy satisfecho de que los artistas de la Orquesta Unhasu hayan ofrecido ese concierto magnifico, que refleja tal como es la aspiracion de nuestro pueblo, usando su revolucionario modo de creacion, el Dirigente evaluo altamente la exitosa funcion.
					
					  Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que en lo adelante tambien, esa banda desarrollara con dinamismo la creacion artistica para estimular la lucha del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos por poner la placa de la gran potencia prospera en la muy digna Corea del Songun. 
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Un, Ri Ul Sol, Kim Chol Man, Kim Yong Chun, Jon Pyong Ho, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Hong Sok Hyong, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu,         Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Pyon Yong Rip, Ju Sang Song, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ri Thae Nam, Kim Rak Hui, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop, O Kuk Ryol y los miembros del Comite Central del PTC en esta capital.

articles.title: Diplomaticos coreano y ruso discuten la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Diplomaticos coreano y ruso discuten la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana 
						
 Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- El ministro- consejero de la Embajada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en Rusia y el subdirector del Departamento no.1 de Asia de la cancilleria rusa intercambiaron el dia primero en Moscu las opiniones sobre la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas. 
					  La parte coreana reitero la invariable posicion y voluntad de lograr la desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana e implementar en todos los sentidos la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre segun el espiritu de igualdad y el principio de accion simultanea.
					
					  La parte rusa reconocio el derecho de Corea a las actividades nucleares con fines pacificos y confirmo que no son la posicion oficial de Rusia las informaciones de algunos medios de prensa de que ese pais europeo no se opone a que se lleve al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el problema de produccion de uranio enriquecido por parte de Corea.
					
					  Ambas partes acordaron cooperar estrechamente en lo adelante tambien para relajar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas.

articles.title: Entidades mexicanas editan boletines por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Entidades mexicanas editan boletines por el 16 de febrero
  Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del cumpleanos (16 de febrero) del Dirigente           Kim Jong Il, varias entidades mexicanas editaron boletines insertando las fotos de el.
					   El boletin no. 51 del Comite Mexicano de Estudio del Kimilsunismo, en su articulo intitulado       "Kim Jong Il, venerado por el pueblo", senalo que el pueblo coreano celebra el 16 de febrero de cada ano como maxima fiesta nacional, lo cual muestra claramente que el Dirigente goza de ardiente veneracion por parte del pueblo. 
					
					  Dio a conocer que el Dirigente ha convertido la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la potencia ideo-politica y militar y agrego que su politica de virtud es la garantia fundamental que posibilito  convertir la sociedad coreana en una gran familia armoniosa. 
					
					  Apunto que tener en gran estima al Dirigente es la maxima gloria y felicidad para el pueblo coreano. 
					
					  El Instituto de la Idea Juche de Mexico inserto en el boletin no. 71 el articulo intitulado "El Dirigente Kim Jong Il y su cumpleanos", que narra los episodios hechos en el 16 de febrero de cada ano.

articles.title: Personalidad costarricense elogia hazanas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Personalidad costarricense elogia hazanas de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el secretario general del Partido Vanguardia Popular de Costa Rica, Humberto Vargas Carbonel, hizo publica el 25 de enero una declaracion.
					En su nota el destaco que el Dirigente continuo y desarrollo la idea Juche, la del Songun, concebidas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, y fortalecio en virtud de ellas el Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) como ente vanguardia que orienta la causa revolucionaria del Songun y agrego que esto es la mas extraordinaria de sus hazanas realizadas dirigiendo el partido.
					
					Continuo que el Dirigente ha sido ratificado como Secretario General del PTC y este evento hizo mas esplendido y prometedor el futuro del PTC y la revolucion coreana y dio la garantia de la prosperidad de la nacion coreana.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que bajo la diestra y probada guia del Dirigente, el PTC y el pueblo coreano glorificaran para siempre las imborrables proezas revolucionarias acumuladas por el Presidente y registraran este ano un viraje decisivo en el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y la construccion de una gran potencia prospera dando un impulso mas a la industria ligera.
